-- test: error non-existent logger --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} logger com.nonexistent.package DEBUG
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} logger
-- expect --
com.example.testapp


-- test: error selector matched no pods --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator -l nonexistent=label health
-- expect:error --
selector nonexistent=label matched no pods


-- test: error no pods selected --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator health
-- expect:error --
no pods selected: specify --pod, --deployment, or --selector
